query-mapping.description: The list of documents for a given folder.

class.name: AWA.Storages.Models.Storage_Info
class.comment: The list of documents for a given folder.

property.name: is_public
property.comment: whether the document is public or not.

property.name: user_name
property.comment: the user name who uploaded the document.

query.name: storage-list
query.comment: Get a list of storage files for a given folder.
query.sql: SELECT st.id, st.name, st.create_date, st.uri, st.storage, st.mime_type, st.file_size, st.is_public, u.name, COALESCE(img.thumb_width, 0), COALESCE(img.thumb_height, 0), img.thumbnail_id FROM awa_storage AS st INNER JOIN awa_acl AS acl ON acl.entity_id = st.workspace_id AND acl.entity_type = $entity_type[awa_workspace] AND acl.user_id = :user_id AND acl.permission = $permission[storage-create] INNER JOIN awa_user AS u ON st.owner_id = u.id LEFT JOIN awa_image AS img ON img.storage_id = st.id WHERE st.folder_id = :folder_id AND st.original_id IS NULL ORDER BY st.create_date DESC
